description: Determine mode of inheritance (MOI) described in a block of text for a condition associated with a given variant-gene pair

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text from which the MOI should be extracted

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The variant for which the MOI should be extracted, in HGVS format

parameters.name: gene
parameters.description: The gene for which the MOI should be extracted
